name: Clean Up After Your Dog
description:
This game is about a Girl and her dog in a glorious adventure about the ordinary task of cleaning up after your dog.

The game features :

•Different locations you can clean up after your dog. In a park, in the snow, in the forest etc.

•A recruitable dog who will auto-battle (if needed). Wow!!

•Different Karens that yell at you for not cleaning up after your dog! Typical KAREN!

•At least 10 different costumes / dresses to collect and wear!

•Parallax Backgrounds, whatever that is!

•A couple sound effects!

•One Weapon. Whoa!

AND, OF COURSE

•Traditional turn-based combat with new and clearly superior Retro Sideview Combat!
